body_html:
I see this error in sanity build:

ERROR: no such package '@protobuf//': Error cloning repository: https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf:

Are we ok with leaving this one in?
I think this change is OK. But if the build is in a broken state, it wont help, I think.

body:
I see this error in sanity build:
```
ERROR: no such package '@protobuf//': Error cloning repository: https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf: cannot open git-upload-pack caused by https://github.com/google/protobuf:
```

Are we ok with leaving this one in?
I think this change is OK. But if the build is in a broken state, it wont help, I think.
